long_description: Watch outdoor activities from your four-footed friend's point of view when you use the Kurgo Camera Mount harness to mount your GoPro or Sony action cam (sold separately) on your dog's back or chest. Five-point adjustment system helps create a perfect fit and great stability for the camera, reducing jittery footage. Harness is quick and easy to put on; simply slip it over your dog's head and then clip the quick-release buckles around the midsection. Broad, padded chest plate helps ensure extra protection and comfort. Note: GoPro cams can be mounted on the chest or back; Sony cams can be mounted on the back only.
short_description: Watch outdoor activities from your four-footed friend's point of view when you use the Kurgo Camera Mount harness to mount your GoPro or Sony action cam (sold separately) on your dog's back or chest.
